meaningMnemonic: In your <radical>mouth</radical> you put your <radical>life</radical> on the line by putting in a <radical>sword</radical> that is <radical>big</radical>. You put it all the way down there, so you <kanji>consume</kanji> it.
readingMnemonic: The "<kanji>consume</kanji> a sword" illusion came with a cheap magic <reading>kit</reading> (きつ) you had.
